Perfect! Now I can see the structure. Let me create the DriggsPackMedallion component. The file extension should be `.tsx` since this is a React TypeScript component.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
'use client';

import React from 'react';

interface DriggsPackMedallionProps {
  driggspackNumber: number;
  siteId: string;
  onZzClick: (event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLTableCellElement>, zzType: string, siteId: string) => void;
  onMiddleClick?: (driggspackType: string, siteId: string) => void;
  onBottomClick?: (driggspackType: string, siteId: string) => void;
}

const DriggsPackMedallion: React.FC<DriggsPackMedallionProps> = ({
  driggspackNumber,
  siteId,
  onZzClick,
  onMiddleClick,
  onBottomClick
}) => {
  // Define the content for each row based on the driggspack number
  const getZzText = () => `zz${driggspackNumber}`;
  
  const getMiddleText = () => {
    switch (driggspackNumber) {
      case 1: return 'full1 (for ref)';
      case 2: return 'for citations';
      case 3: return 'for chat with ai';
      default: return `middle${driggspackNumber}`;
    }
  };
  
  const getBottomText = () => `driggspack${driggspackNumber}`;

  const handleMiddleClick = () => {
    if (onMiddleClick) {
      onMiddleClick(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}-middle`, siteId);
    } else {
      console.log(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}-middle`, siteId);
    }
  };

  const handleBottomClick = () => {
    if (onBottomClick) {
      onBottomClick(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}`, siteId);
    } else {
      console.log(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}`, siteId);
    }
  };

  return (
    <table className="border-collapse" style={{ fontSize: '14px' }}>
      <tbody>
        {/* Top row - zz1/zz2/zz3 */}
        <tr>
          <td 
            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-200" 
            onClick={(e) => onZzClick(e, getZzText(), siteId)}
          >
            {getZzText()}
          </td>
        </tr>
        
        {/* Middle row - contextual text */}
        <tr>
          <td 
            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-150 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-250" 
            onClick={handleMiddleClick}
          >
            {getMiddleText()}
          </td>
        </tr>
        
        {/* Bottom row - driggspack text */}
        <tr>
          <td 
            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-300" 
            onClick={handleBottomClick}
          >
            {getBottomText()}
          </td>
        </tr>
      </tbody>
    </table>
  );
};

export default DriggsPackMedallion;
```

- `onBottomClick`: Optional handler for bottom row clicks

   - `driggspack1`, `driggspack2`, `driggspack3` for bottom row

   ```tsx
     driggspackNumber={1}
     siteId={site.id}
     onZzClick={handleDriggspackClick}
   ```

3. **Proper Spacing**: Added `mb-6` margin to separate the medallion from future content

## üîß **Implementation Details**

The logic automatically determines which medallion to show:
```tsx

  siteId={driggspackPopup.siteId}
  onZzClick={handleDriggspackClick}
/>
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Perfect! I've successfully added the /dpackjar navigation button to each popup. Here's what I implemented:

## üîò **New Button Features**

**Below each medallion** in every popup (zz1, zz2, zz3), there's now a button with:

### **Visual Design:**
- **Text**: "/dpackjar" 
- **Font Size**: 16px (as requested)
- **Background**: Light gray (`bg-gray-200`)
- **Hover Effect**: Darker gray (`hover:bg-gray-300`) with smooth transition
- **Padding**: `px-4 py-2` for comfortable clickable area
- **Rounded corners** for modern appearance

### **Click Behavior:**
- **Left Click**: Opens /dpackjar in new tab
- **Middle Click** (mouse wheel click): Opens /dpackjar in new tab  
- **Always New Tab**: Regardless of click type, it always opens in a new tab
- **Security**: Uses `noopener,noreferrer` for security best practices

### **Implementation Details:**
```tsx
<Link 
  href="/dpackjar" 
  target="_blank"
  rel="noopener noreferrer"
  onMouseDown={(e) => {
    // Handles middle click
    if (e.button === 1) {
      e.preventDefault();
      window.open('/dpackjar', '_blank', 'noopener,noreferrer');
    }
  }}
  onClick={(e) => {
    // Handles regular click - always forces new tab
    e.preventDefault();
    window.open('/dpackjar', '_blank', 'noopener,noreferrer');
  }}
>
  /dpackjar
</Link>
```

Now when users open any of the driggspack popups (zz1, zz2, or zz3), they'll see:
1. The popup title (zz1/zz2/zz3)
2. The corresponding DriggsPackMedallion
3. The new /dpackjar navigation button
4. Space for additional future content

The button works with both normal clicks and middle-clicks, always opening the /dpackjar page in a new tab! üéâ

```
    45‚Üí}) => {
    46‚Üí  // Construct the border string from individual props
    47‚Üí  const border = `${borderWidth} solid ${borderColor}`;
    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí  // Combine all styles
    50‚Üí  const combinedStyles: React.CSSProperties = {
    51‚Üí    backgroundColor,
    52‚Üí    border,
    53‚Üí    borderRadius,
    54‚Üí    padding,
    55‚Üí    fontSize,
    56‚Üí    fontWeight: fontWeight as React.CSSProperties['fontWeight'],
    57‚Üí    color,
    58‚Üí    display: 'inline-block',
    59‚Üí    cursor: onClick ? 'pointer' : 'default',
    60‚Üí    userSelect: 'none',
    61‚Üí    ...style // Allow override with custom styles
    62‚Üí  };
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí  return (
    65‚Üí    <div className="nubra-tableface-kite-wrapper mb-2">
    66‚Üí      <div 
    67‚Üí        className={`nubra-tableface-kite ${className}`}
    68‚Üí        style={combinedStyles}
    69‚Üí        onClick={onClick}
    70‚Üí        role={onClick ? 'button' : 'presentation'}
    71‚Üí        tabIndex={onClick ? 0 : undefined}
    72‚Üí        onKeyDown={onClick ? (e) => {
    73‚Üí          if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') {
    74‚Üí            e.preventDefault();
    75‚Üí            onClick();
    76‚Üí          }
    77‚Üí        } : undefined}
    78‚Üí      >
    79‚Üí        {text}
    80‚Üí      </div>
    81‚Üí    </div>
    82‚Üí  );
    83‚Üí};
    84‚Üí
    85‚Üíexport default NubraTablefaceKite;
```

`SUPABASE_URL=https://jerylujyofmmjukwlwvn.supabase.co SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImplcnlsdWp5b2ZtbWp1a3dsd3ZuIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NDQyNTE1MCwiZXhwIjoyMDcwMDAxMTUwfQ.09zsgogOOCZeaJ9R6K5D4q2_jzKXFh54f-CNBfwrEQc node -e "
const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY);

async function getDriggsPacksSchema() {
  try {
    console.log('üîç Checking driggs_packs table schema...');
    
    // First let's try to get sample data to understand the structure
    const { data, error } = await supabase
      .from('driggs_packs')
      .select('*')
      .limit(1);
    
    if (error) {
      console.log('‚ùå Error (table might not exist yet):', error.message);
      console.log('üìù Expected schema based on previous conversation:');
      console.log('  - dpack_id (serial/primary key)');
      console.log('  - dpack_datum (text)');
      console.log('  - dpack_note (text)');
      console.log('  - created_at (timestamp)');
      console.log('  - updated_at (timestamp)');
      return;
    }
    
    if (data && data.length > 0) {
      console.log('‚úÖ Table exists! Current schema:');
      Object.keys(data[0]).forEach(column => {
        const value = data[0][column];
        const type = value === null ? 'null' : typeof value;
        console.log('  - ' + column + ': ' + type);
      });
    } else {
      console.log('‚úÖ Table exists but is empty');
      console.log('Cannot determine field structure from empty table');
    }
    
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('üí• Error:', err.message);
  }
}

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Now I'll create the complete DriggsPacksTable component based on the styling patterns I found in FilejarTable. Let me create the component:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';

const NubraTablefaceKite = dynamic(
  () => import('@/app/utils/nubra-tableface-kite').then(mod => ({ default: mod.NubraTablefaceKite })),
  { ssr: false }
);

interface DriggsPacksRecord {
  dpack_id: number;
  dpack_datum: string | null;
  dpack_note: string | null;
  created_at: string;
  updated_at: string | null;
}

export default function DriggsPacksTable() {
  const [data, setData] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof DriggsPacksRecord>('created_at');
  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
  
  // Modal states
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
  const [isEditModalOpen, setIsEditModalOpen] = useState(false);
  const [editingRecord, setEditingRecord] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord | null>(null);
  
  // Inline editing states
  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
  
  // Form data for creating/editing
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    dpack_datum: '',
    dpack_note: ''
  });

  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();

  // Fetch data from Supabase
  const fetchData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);
      
      const { data: fetchedData, error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .select('*')
        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });

      if (error) throw error;
      
      setData(fetchedData || []);
    } catch (err: any) {
      setError(err.message);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchData();
  }, []);

  // Filter and sort data
  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
      if (!searchTerm.trim()) return true;
      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
      );
    });

    // Sort data
    filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => {
      const aValue = a[sortField];
      const bValue = b[sortField];
      
      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      
      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      return 0;
    });

    return filtered;
  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);

  // Pagination
  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
  const startIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? 0 : (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
  const endIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : startIndex + itemsPerPage;
  const currentData = filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

  // Handle sorting
  const handleSort = (field: keyof DriggsPacksRecord) => {
    if (field === sortField) {
      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortField(field);
      setSortOrder('asc');
    }
  };

  // Handle row selection
  const handleSelectRow = (id: number) => {
    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
      newSelected.delete(id);
    } else {
      newSelected.add(id);
    }
    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
  };

  const handleSelectAll = () => {
    if (selectedRows.size === currentData.length) {
      setSelectedRows(new Set());
    } else {
      setSelectedRows(new Set(currentData.map(item => item.dpack_id)));
    }
  };

  // Pagination controls component
  const PaginationControls = () => {
    const pageOptions = [10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500];
    
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
        {/* Items per page */}
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Show:</span>
          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
            {pageOptions.map((option, index) => (
              <button
                key={option}
                onClick={() => {
                  setItemsPerPage(option);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
                  itemsPerPage === option
                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                } ${
                  index === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
                  index === pageOptions.length - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
                } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
                style={{ 
                  fontSize: '14px',
                  paddingTop: '10px',
                  paddingBottom: '10px'
                }}
              >
                {option}
              </button>
            ))}
            <button
              onClick={() => {
                setItemsPerPage(-1);
                setCurrentPage(1);
              }}
              className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
                itemsPerPage === -1
                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                  : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
              }`}
              style={{ 
                fontSize: '14px',
                paddingTop: '10px',
                paddingBottom: '10px'
              }}
            >
              All
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Page navigation */}
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Page:</span>
          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(totalPages, 10) }, (_, i) => {
              const pageNum = i + 1;
              return (
                <button
                  key={pageNum}
                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
                  className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
                    currentPage === pageNum
                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                  } ${
                    i === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
                    i === Math.min(totalPages, 10) - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
                  } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
                  style={{ 
                    fontSize: '14px',
                    paddingTop: '10px',
                    paddingBottom: '10px'
                  }}
                >
                  {pageNum}
                </button>
              );
            })}
            {totalPages > 10 && (
              <button
                onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
                  currentPage === totalPages
                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                }`}
                style={{ 
                  fontSize: '14px',
                  paddingTop: '10px',
                  paddingBottom: '10px'
                }}
              >
                {totalPages}
              </button>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  };

  // Create new record inline
  const createNewRecordInline = async () => {
    try {
      const { data: newRecord, error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .insert([{
          dpack_datum: 'New Record',
          dpack_note: 'Enter note...'
        }])
        .select('*')
        .single();

      if (error) throw error;

      // Add to local data at the beginning
      setData(prevData => [newRecord, ...prevData]);
      
      // Start editing the first field
      setEditingCell({ id: newRecord.dpack_id, field: 'dpack_datum' });
      setEditingValue('New Record');
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  // Handle inline editing
  const handleCellClick = (id: number, field: string, value: any) => {
    if (field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at') return;
    
    setEditingCell({ id, field });
    setEditingValue(value || '');
  };

  const handleCellSave = async () => {
    if (!editingCell) return;

    try {
      const updateData = {
        [editingCell.field]: editingValue.trim() || null,
        updated_at: new Date().toISOString()
      };

      const { error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .update(updateData)
        .eq('dpack_id', editingCell.id);

      if (error) throw error;

      // Update local data
      setData(prevData =>
        prevData.map(item =>
          item.dpack_id === editingCell.id
            ? { ...item, ...updateData }
            : item
        )
      );

      setEditingCell(null);
      setEditingValue('');
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error updating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to update record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  const handleCellCancel = () => {
    setEditingCell(null);
    setEditingValue('');
  };

  // Handle form submission for popup modal
  const handleCreateSubmit = async () => {
    try {
      const insertData = {
        dpack_datum: formData.dpack_datum.trim() || null,
        dpack_note: formData.dpack_note.trim() || null
      };
      
      const { error: insertError } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .insert([insertData]);
        
      if (insertError) throw insertError;
      
      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
      resetForm();
      fetchData();
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  // Reset form
  const resetForm = () => {
    setFormData({
      dpack_datum: '',
      dpack_note: ''
    });
  };

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading driggs_packs data...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
        <div className="text-red-500">Error loading data: {error}</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Nubra Tableface Kite */}
      <div className="px-4 py-2">
        <NubraTablefaceKite text="driggs_packs tableface" />
      </div>

      {/* Top Header Area */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-2 border-t-0">
        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} records
              {selectedRows.size > 0 && ` (${selectedRows.size} selected)`}
            </div>
            <PaginationControls />
            <div className="relative">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search all fields..."
                value={searchTerm}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
              />
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setSearchTerm('');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
              >
                CL
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <div className="flex space-x-2">
              <button
                onClick={createNewRecordInline}
                className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Inline)
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(true)}
                className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Popup)
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Table */}
      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
        <table className="min-w-full bg-white">
          <thead className="bg-gray-50">
            <tr>
              {/* Checkbox column */}
              <th 
                className="w-8 px-3 py-3 text-left cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={handleSelectAll}
                style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
              >
                <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
                  <input
                    type="checkbox"
                    checked={selectedRows.size === currentData.length && currentData.length > 0}
                    onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
                    className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
                    style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                  />
                </div>
              </th>
              
              {/* Data columns */}
              {['dpack_id', 'dpack_datum', 'dpack_note', 'created_at', 'updated_at'].map(field => (
                <th
                  key={field}
                  onClick={() => handleSort(field as keyof DriggsPacksRecord)}
                  className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 border-b border-gray-200"
                >
                  <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">
                    <span>{field}</span>
                    {sortField === field && (
                      <span className="text-blue-500">
                        {sortOrder === 'asc' ? '‚Üë' : '‚Üì'}
                      </span>
                    )}
                  </div>
                </th>
              ))}
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
            {currentData.map((record) => (
              <tr key={record.dpack_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
                {/* Checkbox */}
                <td 
                  className="w-8 px-3 py-4 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleSelectRow(record.dpack_id)}
                  style={{ width: '20px' }}
                >
                  <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
                    <input
                      type="checkbox"
                      checked={selectedRows.has(record.dpack_id)}
                      onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
                      className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                    />
                  </div>
                </td>

                {/* Data fields */}
                {Object.entries(record).map(([field, value]) => {
                  const isEditing = editingCell?.id === record.dpack_id && editingCell?.field === field;
                  const isReadonly = field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at';
                  
                  return (
                    <td
                      key={field}
                      className={`px-6 py-4 text-sm ${isReadonly ? 'text-gray-500' : 'text-gray-900 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50'}`}
                      onClick={() => !isReadonly && handleCellClick(record.dpack_id, field, value)}
                    >
                      {isEditing ? (
                        <input
                          type="text"
                          value={editingValue}
                          onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
                          onBlur={handleCellSave}
                          onKeyDown={(e) => {
                            if (e.key === 'Enter') handleCellSave();
                            if (e.key === 'Escape') handleCellCancel();
                          }}
                          className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-blue-300 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                          autoFocus
                        />
                      ) : (
                        <div className={`${!isReadonly ? 'hover:bg-yellow-50' : ''} p-1 rounded`}>
                          {field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at' 
                            ? value ? new Date(value).toLocaleString() : 'N/A'
                            : value || (isReadonly ? 'N/A' : 'Click to edit')
                          }
                        </div>
                      )}
                    </td>
                  );
                })}
              </tr>
            ))}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {/* Bottom Pagination */}
      <div className="bg-white border-t border-gray-200 px-4 py-2">
        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} records
            </div>
            <PaginationControls />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Create Modal */}
      {isCreateModalOpen && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50">
          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-2xl mx-4">
            <div className="px-6 py-4 border-b border-gray-200">
              <h2 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900">Create New Driggs Pack</h2>
            </div>
            
            <div className="px-6 py-4 space-y-4">
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Datum
                </label>
                <input
                  type="text"
                  value={formData.dpack_datum}
                  onChange={(e) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, dpack_datum: e.target.value }))}
                  className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                />
              </div>
              
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Note
                </label>
                <textarea
                  value={formData.dpack_note}
                  onChange={(e) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, dpack_note: e.target.value }))}
                  rows={3}
                  className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                />
              </div>
            </div>
            
            <div className="px-6 py-4 border-t border-gray-200 flex justify-end space-x-4">
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
                  resetForm();
                }}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-50"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={handleCreateSubmit}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-white bg-blue-600 border border-transparent rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
              >
                Create
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

Tool use: **Bash** Create components directory for dpackjar

`mkdir -p "/Users/kylecampbell/Documents/repos/localrepo-snefuru4/app/(protected)/dpackjar/components"`

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
'use client';

import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';

const NubraTablefaceKite = dynamic(
  () => import('@/app/utils/nubra-tableface-kite').then(mod => ({ default: mod.NubraTablefaceKite })),
  { ssr: false }
);

interface DriggsPacksRecord {
  dpack_id: number;
  dpack_datum: string | null;
  dpack_note: string | null;
  created_at: string;
  updated_at: string | null;
}

export default function DriggsPacksTable() {
  const [data, setData] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof DriggsPacksRecord>('created_at');
  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
  
  // Modal states
  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
  const [isEditModalOpen, setIsEditModalOpen] = useState(false);
  const [editingRecord, setEditingRecord] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord | null>(null);
  
  // Inline editing states
  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
  
  // Form data for creating/editing
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    dpack_datum: '',
    dpack_note: ''
  });

  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();

  // Fetch data from Supabase
  const fetchData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);
      
      const { data: fetchedData, error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .select('*')
        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });

      if (error) throw error;
      
      setData(fetchedData || []);
    } catch (err: any) {
      setError(err.message);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchData();
  }, []);

  // Filter and sort data
  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
      if (!searchTerm.trim()) return true;
      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
      );
    });

    // Sort data
    filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => {
      const aValue = a[sortField];
      const bValue = b[sortField];
      
      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      
      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
      return 0;
    });

    return filtered;
  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);

  // Pagination
  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
  const startIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? 0 : (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
  const endIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : startIndex + itemsPerPage;
  const currentData = filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

  // Handle sorting
  const handleSort = (field: keyof DriggsPacksRecord) => {
    if (field === sortField) {
      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortField(field);
      setSortOrder('asc');
    }
  };

  // Handle row selection
  const handleSelectRow = (id: number) => {
    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
      newSelected.delete(id);
    } else {
      newSelected.add(id);
    }
    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
  };

  const handleSelectAll = () => {
    if (selectedRows.size === currentData.length) {
      setSelectedRows(new Set());
    } else {
      setSelectedRows(new Set(currentData.map(item => item.dpack_id)));
    }
  };

  // Pagination controls component
  const PaginationControls = () => {
    const pageOptions = [10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500];
    
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
        {/* Items per page */}
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Show:</span>
          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
            {pageOptions.map((option, index) => (
              <button
                key={option}
                onClick={() => {
                  setItemsPerPage(option);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
                  itemsPerPage === option
                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                } ${
                  index === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
                  index === pageOptions.length - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
                } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
                style={{ 
                  fontSize: '14px',
                  paddingTop: '10px',
                  paddingBottom: '10px'
                }}
              >
                {option}
              </button>
            ))}
            <button
              onClick={() => {
                setItemsPerPage(-1);
                setCurrentPage(1);
              }}
              className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
                itemsPerPage === -1
                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                  : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
              }`}
              style={{ 
                fontSize: '14px',
                paddingTop: '10px',
                paddingBottom: '10px'
              }}
            >
              All
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Page navigation */}
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Page:</span>
          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(totalPages, 10) }, (_, i) => {
              const pageNum = i + 1;
              return (
                <button
                  key={pageNum}
                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
                  className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
                    currentPage === pageNum
                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                  } ${
                    i === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
                    i === Math.min(totalPages, 10) - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
                  } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
                  style={{ 
                    fontSize: '14px',
                    paddingTop: '10px',
                    paddingBottom: '10px'
                  }}
                >
                  {pageNum}
                </button>
              );
            })}
            {totalPages > 10 && (
              <button
                onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
                  currentPage === totalPages
                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
                }`}
                style={{ 
                  fontSize: '14px',
                  paddingTop: '10px',
                  paddingBottom: '10px'
                }}
              >
                {totalPages}
              </button>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  };

  // Create new record inline
  const createNewRecordInline = async () => {
    try {
      const { data: newRecord, error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .insert([{
          dpack_datum: 'New Record',
          dpack_note: 'Enter note...'
        }])
        .select('*')
        .single();

      if (error) throw error;

      // Add to local data at the beginning
      setData(prevData => [newRecord, ...prevData]);
      
      // Start editing the first field
      setEditingCell({ id: newRecord.dpack_id, field: 'dpack_datum' });
      setEditingValue('New Record');
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  // Handle inline editing
  const handleCellClick = (id: number, field: string, value: any) => {
    if (field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at') return;
    
    setEditingCell({ id, field });
    setEditingValue(value || '');
  };

  const handleCellSave = async () => {
    if (!editingCell) return;

    try {
      const updateData = {
        [editingCell.field]: editingValue.trim() || null,
        updated_at: new Date().toISOString()
      };

      const { error } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .update(updateData)
        .eq('dpack_id', editingCell.id);

      if (error) throw error;

      // Update local data
      setData(prevData =>
        prevData.map(item =>
          item.dpack_id === editingCell.id
            ? { ...item, ...updateData }
            : item
        )
      );

      setEditingCell(null);
      setEditingValue('');
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error updating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to update record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  const handleCellCancel = () => {
    setEditingCell(null);
    setEditingValue('');
  };

  // Handle form submission for popup modal
  const handleCreateSubmit = async () => {
    try {
      const insertData = {
        dpack_datum: formData.dpack_datum.trim() || null,
        dpack_note: formData.dpack_note.trim() || null
      };
      
      const { error: insertError } = await supabase
        .from('driggs_packs')
        .insert([insertData]);
        
      if (insertError) throw insertError;
      
      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
      resetForm();
      fetchData();
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
    }
  };

  // Reset form
  const resetForm = () => {
    setFormData({
      dpack_datum: '',
      dpack_note: ''
    });
  };

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading driggs_packs data...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
        <div className="text-red-500">Error loading data: {error}</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      {/* Nubra Tableface Kite */}
      <div className="px-4 py-2">
        <NubraTablefaceKite text="driggs_packs tableface" />
      </div>

      {/* Top Header Area */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-2 border-t-0">
        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} records
              {selectedRows.size > 0 && ` (${selectedRows.size} selected)`}
            </div>
            <PaginationControls />
            <div className="relative">
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search all fields..."
                value={searchTerm}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
              />
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setSearchTerm('');
                  setCurrentPage(1);
                }}
                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
              >
                CL
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <div className="flex space-x-2">
              <button
                onClick={createNewRecordInline}
                className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Inline)
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(true)}
                className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
              >
                Create New (Popup)
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Table */}
      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
        <table className="min-w-full bg-white">
          <thead className="bg-gray-50">
            <tr>
              {/* Checkbox column */}
              <th 
                className="w-8 px-3 py-3 text-left cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={handleSelectAll}
                style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
              >
                <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
                  <input
                    type="checkbox"
                    checked={selectedRows.size === currentData.length && currentData.length > 0}
                    onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
                    className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
                    style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                  />
                </div>
              </th>
              
              {/* Data columns */}
              {['dpack_id', 'dpack_datum', 'dpack_note', 'created_at', 'updated_at'].map(field => (
                <th
                  key={field}
                  onClick={() => handleSort(field as keyof DriggsPacksRecord)}
                  className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 border-b border-gray-200"
                >
                  <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">
                    <span>{field}</span>
                    {sortField === field && (
                      <span className="text-blue-500">
                        {sortOrder === 'asc' ? '‚Üë' : '‚Üì'}
                      </span>
                    )}
                  </div>
                </th>
              ))}
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
            {currentData.map((record) => (
              <tr key={record.dpack_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
                {/* Checkbox */}
                <td 
                  className="w-8 px-3 py-4 cursor-pointer"
                  onClick={() => handleSelectRow(record.dpack_id)}
                  style={{ width: '20px' }}
                >
                  <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
                    <input
                      type="checkbox"
                      checked={selectedRows.has(record.dpack_id)}
                      onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
                      className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
                    />
                  </div>
                </td>

                {/* Data fields */}
                {Object.entries(record).map(([field, value]) => {
                  const isEditing = editingCell?.id === record.dpack_id && editingCell?.field === field;
                  const isReadonly = field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at';
                  
                  return (
                    <td
                      key={field}
                      className={`px-6 py-4 text-sm ${isReadonly ? 'text-gray-500' : 'text-gray-900 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50'}`}
                      onClick={() => !isReadonly && handleCellClick(record.dpack_id, field, value)}
                    >
                      {isEditing ? (
                        <input
                          type="text"
                          value={editingValue}
                          onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
                          onBlur={handleCellSave}
                          onKeyDown={(e) => {
                            if (e.key === 'Enter') handleCellSave();
                            if (e.key === 'Escape') handleCellCancel();
                          }}
                          className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-blue-300 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                          autoFocus
                        />
                      ) : (
                        <div className={`${!isReadonly ? 'hover:bg-yellow-50' : ''} p-1 rounded`}>
                          {field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at' 
                            ? value ? new Date(value).toLocaleString() : 'N/A'
                            : value || (isReadonly ? 'N/A' : 'Click to edit')
                          }
                        </div>
                      )}
                    </td>
                  );
                })}
              </tr>
            ))}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {/* Bottom Pagination */}
      <div className="bg-white border-t border-gray-200 px-4 py-2">
        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} records
            </div>
            <PaginationControls />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Create Modal */}
      {isCreateModalOpen && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50">
          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-2xl mx-4">
            <div className="px-6 py-4 border-b border-gray-200">
              <h2 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900">Create New Driggs Pack</h2>
            </div>
            
            <div className="px-6 py-4 space-y-4">
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Datum
                </label>
                <input
                  type="text"
                  value={formData.dpack_datum}
                  onChange={(e) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, dpack_datum: e.target.value }))}
                  className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                />
              </div>
              
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
                  Note
                </label>
                <textarea
                  value={formData.dpack_note}
                  onChange={(e) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, dpack_note: e.target.value }))}
                  rows={3}
                  className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
                />
              </div>
            </div>
            
            <div className="px-6 py-4 border-t border-gray-200 flex justify-end space-x-4">
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
                  resetForm();
                }}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-50"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={handleCreateSubmit}
                className="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-white bg-blue-600 border border-transparent rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
              >
                Create
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```
    48‚Üí  // Fetch data from Supabase
    49‚Üí  const fetchData = async () => {
    50‚Üí    try {
    51‚Üí      setLoading(true);
    52‚Üí      setError(null);
    53‚Üí      
    54‚Üí      const { data: fetchedData, error } = await supabase
    55‚Üí        .from('driggs_packs')
    56‚Üí        .select('*')
    57‚Üí        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
    60‚Üí      
    61‚Üí      setData(fetchedData || []);
    62‚Üí    } catch (err: any) {
    63‚Üí      setError(err.message);
    64‚Üí    } finally {
    65‚Üí      setLoading(false);
    66‚Üí    }
    67‚Üí  };
    68‚Üí
    69‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    70‚Üí    fetchData();
    71‚Üí  }, []);
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí  // Filter and sort data
    74‚Üí  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    75‚Üí    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
    76‚Üí      if (!searchTerm.trim()) return true;
    77‚Üí      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
    78‚Üí        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    79‚Üí      );
    80‚Üí    });
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí    // Sort data
    83‚Üí    filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => {
    84‚Üí      const aValue = a[sortField];
    85‚Üí      const bValue = b[sortField];
    86‚Üí      
    87‚Üí      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
    88‚Üí      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
    89‚Üí      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
    90‚Üí      
    91‚Üí      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
    92‚Üí      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
    93‚Üí      return 0;
    94‚Üí    });
    95‚Üí
    96‚Üí    return filtered;
    97‚Üí  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);
    98‚Üí
    99‚Üí  // Pagination
   100‚Üí  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
   101‚Üí  const startIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? 0 : (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
   102‚Üí  const endIndex = itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : startIndex + itemsPerPage;
   103‚Üí  const currentData = filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
   104‚Üí
   105‚Üí  // Handle sorting
   106‚Üí  const handleSort = (field: keyof DriggsPacksRecord) => {
   107‚Üí    if (field === sortField) {
   108‚Üí      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
   109‚Üí    } else {
   110‚Üí      setSortField(field);
   111‚Üí      setSortOrder('asc');
   112‚Üí    }
   113‚Üí  };
   114‚Üí
   115‚Üí  // Handle row selection
   116‚Üí  const handleSelectRow = (id: number) => {
   117‚Üí    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
   118‚Üí    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
   119‚Üí      newSelected.delete(id);
   120‚Üí    } else {
   121‚Üí      newSelected.add(id);
   122‚Üí    }
   123‚Üí    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
   124‚Üí  };
   125‚Üí
   126‚Üí  const handleSelectAll = () => {
   127‚Üí    if (selectedRows.size === currentData.length) {
   128‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set());
   129‚Üí    } else {
   130‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set(currentData.map(item => item.dpack_id)));
   131‚Üí    }
   132‚Üí  };
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí  // Pagination controls component
   135‚Üí  const PaginationControls = () => {
   136‚Üí    const pageOptions = [10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500];
   137‚Üí    
   138‚Üí    return (
   139‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   140‚Üí        {/* Items per page */}
   141‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   142‚Üí          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Show:</span>
   143‚Üí          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
   144‚Üí            {pageOptions.map((option, index) => (
   145‚Üí              <button
   146‚Üí                key={option}
   147‚Üí                onClick={() => {
   148‚Üí                  setItemsPerPage(option);
   149‚Üí                  setCurrentPage(1);
   150‚Üí                }}
   151‚Üí                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
   152‚Üí                  itemsPerPage === option
   153‚Üí                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
   154‚Üí                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
   155‚Üí                } ${
   156‚Üí                  index === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
   157‚Üí                  index === pageOptions.length - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
   158‚Üí                } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
   159‚Üí                style={{ 
   160‚Üí                  fontSize: '14px',
   161‚Üí                  paddingTop: '10px',
   162‚Üí                  paddingBottom: '10px'
   163‚Üí                }}
   164‚Üí              >
   165‚Üí                {option}
   166‚Üí              </button>
   167‚Üí            ))}
   168‚Üí            <button
   169‚Üí              onClick={() => {
   170‚Üí                setItemsPerPage(-1);
   171‚Üí                setCurrentPage(1);
   172‚Üí              }}
   173‚Üí              className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
   174‚Üí                itemsPerPage === -1
   175‚Üí                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
   176‚Üí                  : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
   177‚Üí              }`}
   178‚Üí              style={{ 
   179‚Üí                fontSize: '14px',
   180‚Üí                paddingTop: '10px',
   181‚Üí                paddingBottom: '10px'
   182‚Üí              }}
   183‚Üí            >
   184‚Üí              All
   185‚Üí            </button>
   186‚Üí          </div>
   187‚Üí        </div>
   188‚Üí
   189‚Üí        {/* Page navigation */}
   190‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   191‚Üí          <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 mr-2">Page:</span>
   192‚Üí          <div className="flex border border-gray-300">
   193‚Üí            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(totalPages, 10) }, (_, i) => {
   194‚Üí              const pageNum = i + 1;
   195‚Üí              return (
   196‚Üí                <button
   197‚Üí                  key={pageNum}
   198‚Üí                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
   199‚Üí                  className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors ${
   200‚Üí                    currentPage === pageNum
   201‚Üí                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
   202‚Üí                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
   203‚Üí                  } ${
   204‚Üí                    i === 0 ? 'rounded-l' : 
   205‚Üí                    i === Math.min(totalPages, 10) - 1 ? 'rounded-r' : ''
   206‚Üí                  } border-r border-gray-300 last:border-r-0`}
   207‚Üí                  style={{ 
   208‚Üí                    fontSize: '14px',
   209‚Üí                    paddingTop: '10px',
   210‚Üí                    paddingBottom: '10px'
   211‚Üí                  }}
   212‚Üí                >
   213‚Üí                  {pageNum}
   214‚Üí                </button>
   215‚Üí              );
   216‚Üí            })}
   217‚Üí            {totalPages > 10 && (
   218‚Üí              <button
   219‚Üí                onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
   220‚Üí                className={`px-2 py-2 text-sm transition-colors rounded-r ${
   221‚Üí                  currentPage === totalPages
   222‚Üí                    ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white'
   223‚Üí                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700'
   224‚Üí                }`}
   225‚Üí                style={{ 
   226‚Üí                  fontSize: '14px',
   227‚Üí                  paddingTop: '10px',
   228‚Üí                  paddingBottom: '10px'
   229‚Üí                }}
   230‚Üí              >
   231‚Üí                {totalPages}
   232‚Üí              </button>
   233‚Üí            )}
   234‚Üí          </div>
   235‚Üí        </div>
   236‚Üí      </div>
   237‚Üí    );
   238‚Üí  };
   239‚Üí
   240‚Üí  // Create new record inline
   241‚Üí  const createNewRecordInline = async () => {
   242‚Üí    try {
   243‚Üí      const { data: newRecord, error } = await supabase
   244‚Üí        .from('driggs_packs')
   245‚Üí        .insert([{
   246‚Üí          dpack_datum: 'New Record',
   247‚Üí          dpack_note: 'Enter note...'
   248‚Üí        }])
   249‚Üí        .select('*')
   250‚Üí        .single();
   251‚Üí
   252‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   253‚Üí
   254‚Üí      // Add to local data at the beginning
   255‚Üí      setData(prevData => [newRecord, ...prevData]);
   256‚Üí      
   257‚Üí      // Start editing the first field
   258‚Üí      setEditingCell({ id: newRecord.dpack_id, field: 'dpack_datum' });
   259‚Üí      setEditingValue('New Record');
   260‚Üí    } catch (err: any) {
   261‚Üí      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   262‚Üí      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
   263‚Üí    }
   264‚Üí  };
   265‚Üí
   266‚Üí  // Handle inline editing
   267‚Üí  const handleCellClick = (id: number, field: string, value: any) => {
   268‚Üí    if (field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at') return;
   269‚Üí    
   270‚Üí    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   271‚Üí    setEditingValue(value || '');
   272‚Üí  };
   273‚Üí
   274‚Üí  const handleCellSave = async () => {
   275‚Üí    if (!editingCell) return;
   276‚Üí
   277‚Üí    try {
   278‚Üí      const updateData = {
   279‚Üí        [editingCell.field]: editingValue.trim() || null,
   280‚Üí        updated_at: new Date().toISOString()
   281‚Üí      };
   282‚Üí
   283‚Üí      const { error } = await supabase
   284‚Üí        .from('driggs_packs')
   285‚Üí        .update(updateData)
   286‚Üí        .eq('dpack_id', editingCell.id);
   287‚Üí
   288‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   289‚Üí
   290‚Üí      // Update local data
   291‚Üí      setData(prevData =>
   292‚Üí        prevData.map(item =>
   293‚Üí          item.dpack_id === editingCell.id
   294‚Üí            ? { ...item, ...updateData }
   295‚Üí            : item
   296‚Üí        )
   297‚Üí      );
   298‚Üí
   299‚Üí      setEditingCell(null);
   300‚Üí      setEditingValue('');
   301‚Üí    } catch (err: any) {
   302‚Üí      console.error('Error updating record:', err);
   303‚Üí      alert(`Failed to update record: ${err.message}`);
   304‚Üí    }
   305‚Üí  };
   306‚Üí
   307‚Üí  const handleCellCancel = () => {
   308‚Üí    setEditingCell(null);
   309‚Üí    setEditingValue('');
   310‚Üí  };
   311‚Üí
   312‚Üí  // Handle form submission for popup modal
   313‚Üí  const handleCreateSubmit = async () => {
   314‚Üí    try {
   315‚Üí      const insertData = {
   316‚Üí        dpack_datum: formData.dpack_datum.trim() || null,
   317‚Üí        dpack_note: formData.dpack_note.trim() || null
   318‚Üí      };
   319‚Üí      
   320‚Üí      const { error: insertError } = await supabase
   321‚Üí        .from('driggs_packs')
   322‚Üí        .insert([insertData]);
   323‚Üí        
   324‚Üí      if (insertError) throw insertError;
   325‚Üí      
   326‚Üí      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
   327‚Üí      resetForm();
   328‚Üí      fetchData();
   329‚Üí    } catch (err: any) {
   330‚Üí      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   331‚Üí      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err.message}`);
   332‚Üí    }
   333‚Üí  };
   334‚Üí
   335‚Üí  // Reset form
   336‚Üí  const resetForm = () => {
   337‚Üí    setFormData({
   338‚Üí      dpack_datum: '',
   339‚Üí      dpack_note: ''
   340‚Üí    });
   341‚Üí  };
   342‚Üí
   343‚Üí  if (loading) {
   344‚Üí    return (
   345‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
   346‚Üí        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading driggs_packs data...</div>
   347‚Üí      </div>
   348‚Üí    );
   349‚Üí  }
   350‚Üí
   351‚Üí  if (error) {
   352‚Üí    return (
   353‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center justify-center p-8">
   354‚Üí        <div className="text-red-500">Error loading data: {error}</div>
   355‚Üí      </div>
   356‚Üí    );
   357‚Üí  }
   358‚Üí
   359‚Üí  return (
   360‚Üí    <div className="w-full">
   361‚Üí      {/* Nubra Tableface Kite */}
   362‚Üí      <div className="px-4 py-2">
   363‚Üí        <NubraTablefaceKite text="driggs_packs tableface" />
   364‚Üí      </div>
   365‚Üí
   366‚Üí      {/* Top Header Area */}
   367‚Üí      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-2 border-t-0">
   368‚Üí        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
   369‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
   370‚Üí            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
   371‚Üí              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + (itemsPerPage === -1 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage), filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} records
   372‚Üí              {selectedRows.size > 0 && ` (${selectedRows.size} selected)`}
   373‚Üí            </div>
   374‚Üí            <PaginationControls />
   375‚Üí            <div className="relative">
   376‚Üí              <input
   377‚Üí                type="text"
   378‚Üí                placeholder="Search all fields..."
   379‚Üí                value={searchTerm}
   380‚Üí                onChange={(e) => {
   381‚Üí                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
   382‚Üí                  setCurrentPage(1);
   383‚Üí                }}
   384‚Üí                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
   385‚Üí              />
   386‚Üí              <button
   387‚Üí                onClick={() => {
   388‚Üí                  setSearchTerm('');
   389‚Üí                  setCurrentPage(1);
   390‚Üí                }}
   391‚Üí                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
   392‚Üí              >
   393‚Üí                CL
   394‚Üí              </button>
   395‚Üí            </div>
   396‚Üí          </div>
   397‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   398‚Üí            <div className="flex space-x-2">
   399‚Üí              <button
   400‚Üí                onClick={createNewRecordInline}
   401‚Üí                className="bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
   402‚Üí              >
   403‚Üí                Create New (Inline)
   404‚Üí              </button>
   405‚Üí              <button
   406‚Üí                onClick={() => setIsCreateModalOpen(true)}
   407‚Üí                className="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm transition-colors"
   408‚Üí              >
   409‚Üí                Create New (Popup)
   410‚Üí              </button>
   411‚Üí            </div>
   412‚Üí          </div>
   413‚Üí        </div>
   414‚Üí      </div>
   415‚Üí
   416‚Üí      {/* Table */}
   417‚Üí      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
   418‚Üí        <table className="min-w-full bg-white">
   419‚Üí          <thead className="bg-gray-50">
   420‚Üí            <tr>
   421‚Üí              {/* Checkbox column */}
   422‚Üí              <th 
   423‚Üí                className="w-8 px-3 py-3 text-left cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
   424‚Üí                onClick={handleSelectAll}
   425‚Üí                style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
   426‚Üí              >
   427‚Üí                <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
   428‚Üí                  <input
   429‚Üí                    type="checkbox"
   430‚Üí                    checked={selectedRows.size === currentData.length && currentData.length > 0}
   431‚Üí                    onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
   432‚Üí                    className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
   433‚Üí                    style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
   434‚Üí                  />
   435‚Üí                </div>
   436‚Üí              </th>
   437‚Üí              
   438‚Üí              {/* Data columns */}
   439‚Üí              {['dpack_id', 'dpack_datum', 'dpack_note', 'created_at', 'updated_at'].map(field => (
   440‚Üí                <th
   441‚Üí                  key={field}
   442‚Üí                  onClick={() => handleSort(field as keyof DriggsPacksRecord)}
   443‚Üí                  className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-bold text-gray-900 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 border-b border-gray-200"
   444‚Üí                >
   445‚Üí                  <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">
   446‚Üí                    <span>{field}</span>
   447‚Üí                    {sortField === field && (
   448‚Üí                      <span className="text-blue-500">
   449‚Üí                        {sortOrder === 'asc' ? '‚Üë' : '‚Üì'}
   450‚Üí                      </span>
   451‚Üí                    )}
   452‚Üí                  </div>
   453‚Üí                </th>
   454‚Üí              ))}
   455‚Üí            </tr>
   456‚Üí          </thead>
   457‚Üí          <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
   458‚Üí            {currentData.map((record) => (
   459‚Üí              <tr key={record.dpack_id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
   460‚Üí                {/* Checkbox */}
   461‚Üí                <td 
   462‚Üí                  className="w-8 px-3 py-4 cursor-pointer"
   463‚Üí                  onClick={() => handleSelectRow(record.dpack_id)}
   464‚Üí                  style={{ width: '20px' }}
   465‚Üí                >
   466‚Üí                  <div className="w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
   467‚Üí                    <input
   468‚Üí                      type="checkbox"
   469‚Üí                      checked={selectedRows.has(record.dpack_id)}
   470‚Üí                      onChange={() => {}} // Handled by onClick above
   471‚Üí                      className="w-5 h-5 rounded border-gray-300"
   472‚Üí                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
   473‚Üí                    />
   474‚Üí                  </div>
   475‚Üí                </td>
   476‚Üí
   477‚Üí                {/* Data fields */}
   478‚Üí                {Object.entries(record).map(([field, value]) => {
   479‚Üí                  const isEditing = editingCell?.id === record.dpack_id && editingCell?.field === field;
   480‚Üí                  const isReadonly = field === 'dpack_id' || field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at';
   481‚Üí                  
   482‚Üí                  return (
   483‚Üí                    <td
   484‚Üí                      key={field}
   485‚Üí                      className={`px-6 py-4 text-sm ${isReadonly ? 'text-gray-500' : 'text-gray-900 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50'}`}
   486‚Üí                      onClick={() => !isReadonly && handleCellClick(record.dpack_id, field, value)}
   487‚Üí                    >
   488‚Üí                      {isEditing ? (
   489‚Üí                        <input
   490‚Üí                          type="text"
   491‚Üí                          value={editingValue}
   492‚Üí                          onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
   493‚Üí                          onBlur={handleCellSave}
   494‚Üí                          onKeyDown={(e) => {
   495‚Üí                            if (e.key === 'Enter') handleCellSave();
   496‚Üí                            if (e.key === 'Escape') handleCellCancel();
   497‚Üí                          }}
   498‚Üí                          className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-blue-300 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
   499‚Üí                          autoFocus
   500‚Üí                        />
   501‚Üí                      ) : (
   502‚Üí                        <div className={`${!isReadonly ? 'hover:bg-yellow-50' : ''} p-1 rounded`}>
   503‚Üí                          {field === 'created_at' || field === 'updated_at' 
   504‚Üí                            ? value ? new Date(value).toLocaleString() : 'N/A'
   505‚Üí                            : value || (isReadonly ? 'N/A' : 'Click to edit')
   506‚Üí                          }
   507‚Üí                        </div>
   508‚Üí                      )}
   509‚Üí                    </td>
   510‚Üí                  );
   511‚Üí                })}
```
